article_title: Food prices set to rise amid COVID-19 crisis
article_description: Experts say food costs are under a lot of pressure  but that low oil prices are helping mitigate that pressure so far
article_content: Food prices are likely to rise while restaurant prices go down amid COVID 19 and a sinking Canadian dollar  according to a new forecast by the University of Guelph and Dalhousie University   The universities put out a forecast for food prices every December   3133 chars
